$\N \subseteq \Z$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={317}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[48fc3d7f8036bc541cdd6bdd66570211]%mdk
$X \subseteq G$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={317}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={317}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[dfcf28d0734569a6a693bc8194de62bf]%mdk
$G$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={317}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c1442094799dff81ebc15f816725035d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={319}
N_G(X) = \{g \in G : \forall x \in X,\
g^{-1}xg \in X \text{ and } gxg^{-1} \in X \}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={322}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={322}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[dfcf28d0734569a6a693bc8194de62bf]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={322}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c6167f88f885065a6f45c8cfc4888a87]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={324}
C_G(X) = \{ g \in G : \forall x \in X,\
g^{-1}xg = x \}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[245e4b87fe399dd2eb568a0c5e6f914b]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={460}

$\phi$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={460}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[7a7e2cc20c8e3796ced7ff2c513eaa39]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={462}
\ker \phi = \{g \in G : \phi(g) = 1\}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={467}

$\ker \phi \le G$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c52a7aa3d7bcc782e72200057a406384]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={472}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6fb999d2bcd2d880c01da83a5fd5350a]%mdk
$\phi(gh) = \phi(g)\phi(h) = 1 \cdot 1 = 1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={472}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[4e118401901a1d7398d4b2b2cca0b8cb]%mdk

\[%mdk-data-line={476}

\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={531}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[53c912aa99a353c7001f2dfeaa77bb58]%mdk
$f'g'N = fgN$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={531}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2356cff6714f6398849c6475b1f423fd]%mdk
$f' = fm$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={531}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7046b57f4d5dfcd1b5570fb3bcdcf868]%mdk
$g' = gn$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={531}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f6f525bca2401df05061fa3067e1ebb4]%mdk
$m,n \in N$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={531}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[df184c0dfffcf7730c625743090fd6f2]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={533}
(fg)^{-1}(f'g') = g^{-1} f^{-1} fm gn = g^{-1} mgn = m'n
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={535}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[bd55190dfd246292639182d0380facb0]%mdk
$m' = g^{-1} mg \in N$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={535}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[53c912aa99a353c7001f2dfeaa77bb58]%mdk
$f'g'N = fgN$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={537}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[26a03d9e65a2b8d6aaa26cf4aa9944a4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={539}
\begin{aligned}
(fN \cdot gN) \cdot hN &= fN \cdot (gN \cdot hN) \\
(fgN) \cdot hN &= fN \cdot (ghN) \\
(fg)hN &= f(gh)N
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={546}
